content: In this speech, Billy Herrington addresses the crisis faced by Nico Nico Douga, a video sharing platform. He acknowledges that the site is facing serious challenges, including a weakened economy and a threat from disturbance and deletion. However, Herrington remains optimistic, reminding listeners of the site's past achievements and its potential for greatness. He calls for a new era of responsibility, encouraging members of the community to work together to overcome the challenges and ensure the site's future success. He ends with a message of hope, urging the people of Nico Nico Douga to remember that "ASS, WE CAN" and that future generations will look back on this moment with pride.
